title: "About"

This is a simple quarto project. It was designed and built by Eric.

The challenge I faced in using Quarto is the need to render daily in order to make use of today's date 
within the calculations. This has now been automated by making use of GitHub Actions to render daily.



Previously, Eric built a site with Shiny:

- [HappyPhil](http://happyphil.servebeer.com)

As Eric rapidly approaches retirement, he no longer has the patience for Shiny.
